Posts.Content: Is there any update on this thread? I too have been diagnosed with mucinous cancer of prostate and not been able to find any one else with the same diagnosis. Gleason 8 (4+4) I was scheduled for pelvic exenteration last February but had a major heart attack during a stress test that was part of pre-op testing.
Posts.Title: 3 weeks post-retropubic RP

Posts.Content: I had a friend who called the anxiety while waiting for cancer results "scanxiety"
Posts.Title: 6 months post op, waiting for PSA
